name: Omega Watch
longDescription: A product from omega with ocean blue dial

name: Mania Gentleman Steel
shortDescription: Classic steel strap for everyday elegance.
longDescription: A refined steel chronograph-inspired design with comfortable links, minimal dial, and a premium finish. Built for daily wear and formal occasions. Crisp readability, premium polish, and a balanced silhouette.

name: Mania Leather Midnight
shortDescription: Smooth leather strap with bold dial contrast.
longDescription: Midnight dial with crisp markers and a premium leather strap that softens over time. Designed for comfort and style through long days.

name: Mania Chrono Pro
shortDescription: Sporty chrono look with premium finishing.
longDescription: Sport-forward chronograph aesthetic with durable construction and clean time readability. Great for casual-to-smart outfits.

name: Mania Minimal Onyx
longDescription: Minimal watch with strong readability and a premium look. Designed to pair with everything — office, casual, weekend.

name: Mania Classic Silver
shortDescription: Elegant silver tone with modern detailing.
longDescription: Polished finishes and balanced proportions make this a timeless daily watch. Great for gifting and formal wear.

name: Mania Heritage Leather
shortDescription: Comfort leather strap with vintage edge.
longDescription: Soft leather, classic dial, and durable build — a perfect everyday companion. Built to look better as it ages.

name: Mania Urban Black
shortDescription: Matte black look for a sharp outfit.
longDescription: Modern urban style with a bold black finish and premium feel. Perfect for streetwear and smart casual.

name: Mania Signature Gold
shortDescription: Gold tone with clean luxury design.
longDescription: Luxury look with minimal dial and high-quality finishing for special occasions. Premium, tasteful, not loud.

name: Mania Sport Edge
longDescription: Balanced sporty aesthetic for daily wear and weekend fits. Strong readability and premium feel.

name: Mania Steel Blue
shortDescription: Blue dial with sleek steel strap.
longDescription: Blue dial adds personality while steel strap keeps it premium and versatile. Great for day and night styling.

name: Mania Carbon Look
longDescription: Modern dial texture for people who love subtle detail and strong finishing. Clean and premium from every angle.

name: Mania Quartz Prime
longDescription: Simple, dependable, and premium-looking — ideal for everyday use. A clean silhouette that looks expensive.

name: Mania Classic Rose
shortDescription: Rose tone dial with elegant contrast.
longDescription: Classy rose tone with high-end appearance and comfortable wear. Designed to look premium under any lighting.

name: Mania Minimal White
longDescription: Minimal white dial with crisp indices for the cleanest daily look. Fresh and readable with any outfit.

name: Mania Executive Black
longDescription: Built for formal wear — premium dial, clean detailing, and durable structure. The go-to for suits and events.
